name: Skoči Moči
description:
!!! IMPORTANT - THE GAME IS ONLY PLAYABLE WITH SOUND SWITCHED ON !!!

Controls: Left and Right arrow.

Skoči Moči is a tiny platformer game based on one simple mechanic - your character jumps automatically to the music and you can only control the left and right movement.

We created this prototype during the Global Game Jam 2019 in 2 days.

Credits:

  • Jan Ilavsky - programming, graphics
  • Vladimir Hrincar - programming
  • Jaroslav Beck - music
